meta.description: How I led design for the Delta News Hub — a unified communications platform for the world's most-traveled airline, serving 90,000 employees and millions of customers.

hero.label: Case Study — Delta Air Lines
hero.title: High-Fidelity Storytelling for an Iconic Brand
hero.subtitle: Leading the design team that unified Delta's digital newsroom, serving 90,000 employees and millions of passengers annually.

context.challenge: Elevating corporate communications to match the in-flight experience.
context.body: As UX Practice Leader for Sparks Grove (North Highland's innovation agency), I led the strategic consulting engagement for the Delta News Hub. Delta's internal and external communications lived across fragmented legacy systems. I directed our agency teams to architect a unified platform serving corporate comms, media relations, and 90,000 employees under one cohesive, premium experience.

sections.label: The Work
sections.title: Delta News Hub Leadership
sections.description: I led the agency's multidisciplinary product and design teams in establishing a content-rich platform that balanced editorial storytelling with real-time operational priorities.

primaryCard.title: Editorial Architecture
primaryCard.description: Directed the strategy for a modular, category-driven framework designed to scale globally.

secondaryCards.title: Information Strategy
secondaryCards.description: Oversaw the IA development, prioritizing real-time audience needs.

secondaryCards.title: Design Oversight
secondaryCards.description: Managed the visual execution to ensure editorial quality was maintained across all touchpoints.

sections.label: Practice Leadership
sections.title: Transforming the agency.
sections.description: The Delta engagement represented just one key aspect of my purview. As Practice Leader, I transformed the agency itself from a traditional waterfall model to agile software development and lean product management, repositioning the entire practice around "Human Experience Design" (HxD). Over 2.5 years, I pitched and won $4.7M+ in new business and provided product methodology coaching for executives at major Fortune 500s, including The Home Depot. This transformation earned the National Impact Award in 2016.
